TopicTitle: [Showcase] What Has Science Done - A gallery for your terrifying creations

Articles.Content:
I figured we have galleries for landers, space stations, rovers, bases, war machines... but nothing for general weird creations. And so, I present What Has Science Done, where your bizarre, scary, or really-badass-but-doesn't-go-anywhere else creations go. Both mod and stock craft are welcome!

To start off, I'd like to show off two of my recent creations: One is a replica of GLaDOS from Portal, shown here terrorizing Kerbals.

Do I even have to introduce this? I'm sure you can see what it is. The real question is, can I send this to space?
